Texts.Chs: 恐怖。恐惧。这就是黑暗人。不接触，不交谈，不在身边。避开黑暗人。是传说中的故事，当然也许。加卢帕尔吃太阳，创造夜晚，而夜晚是狩猎和造人的好时机。但请记住，格鲁帕尔是永远的守望者，永远的审判者，永远的守护者。你不会进入死亡的世界，如果你打扰黑暗人。只有尊重。
Texts.Eng: Terror. Fear. That is what dark-men are. No touch, no talk, not be around. Avoid dark-men. Is Gallupal of legend, for sure maybe. Gallupal is eating the sun and making the night, and night is good for hunt and baby-making. But remember Gallupal is always watch, always judge, and guarding of the death-world. You will not enter the death-world if you is bother dark-men. Respect only.
